sentences.en: " The bodyguards were of Santino's regime but picked by me.
sentences.cn: “ 真的死了, ” 他说,“保镖是桑迪诺兵团的人,但,是我挑选的.

sentences.en: By the way, I told Michael that Lampone's secret regime would not escape your eye.
sentences.cn: 附带说一下, 我早向迈克尔吩咐过,拉朋的秘密兵团不能躲开你的监视.

sentences.en: Empirical results are needed in the transonic Mach regime.
sentences.cn: 在跨音速马赫数范围内需要经验结果.

sentences.en: He is digging his regime in for the long term.
sentences.cn: 确实,朝鲜现在到处是为领导人修建的地道网和地下设施.

sentences.en: In a floating exchange rate regime reserve accumulations should also be unnecessary.
sentences.cn: 在浮动汇率机制下,储备的累积也应是多馀的.

sentences.en: In Darfur, the regime has carried out appalling crimes.
sentences.cn: 在达尔富尔,当局简直就是在犯罪.

sentences.en: In order to prevent the establishment of a despotic regime, Kant demanded a separation of powers.
sentences.cn: 为了防止形成专制统治, 康德要求权力分立.

sentences.en: In these cases, bearings are operating in the mixed film lubrication regime.
sentences.cn: 在以上所说的情况中, 轴承是在混合油膜模式下运行的.

sentences.en: It was decided ata market - based, single, regulated floating rate regime.
sentences.cn: 我们当时确定的机制是以市场供求为基础, 单一的 、 有管理的浮动汇率.

sentences.en: Michael said softly, " How did you find out about Lampone's regime? "
sentences.cn: 迈克尔客客气气他说: “ 你怎么发现了拉朋的兵团? ”

sentences.en: Purposeful work is an important part of the regime for young offenders.
sentences.cn: 使从事有意义的劳动是管理少年犯的重要方法。

sentences.en: The authorities moved him to the less rigid regime of an open prison.
sentences.cn: 当局把他移送到管理相对宽松的不设防监狱。

sentences.en: The baby's regime included two naps a day.
sentences.cn: 这婴儿的生活规律包括一天小睡两次.

sentences.en: The regime got rid of most of its opponents.
sentences.cn: 该政权清除了大多数反对者。

sentences.en: The treatment regime may vary widely depending on the type of injury.
sentences.cn: 因受伤类型不同治疗方法可能有很大的区别。

sentences.en: This regime is termed mass transport or diffusion limited.
sentences.cn: 这种方式被称作质量输送或扩散控制.

sentences.en: Under the new regime, all sheep and cattle will be regularly tested for disease.
sentences.cn: 根据新制度，所有牛羊都要定期接受疾病检测。

sentences.en: Yuan died shortly thereafter and his regime was overthrown.
sentences.cn: 不久袁世凯身死,洪宪帝制被废.

words.tran_cn: [医] 养生法；生活规则；政体；支配

trans.tran_cn: 政治制度，政权，政体，管理，方法，[医]养生法，（病人等的）生活规则
trans.tran_en: a particular system - used especially when talking about a previous system, or one that has just been introduced
